Title: The New Guy
Plot: Claudette gives Vic a chance to save his job if he agrees to train his potential replacement. An unsolved rape case from the past that Dutch and Claudette were working on resurfaces. Meanwhile, Aceveda meets someone that can help him further his political career.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Alex O'Loughlin, David Marciano, F.J. Rio, Fred Toma, Angela Hughes, Hosea Chanchez, Cherrelle Noyd
